game.name: Arcana Famiglia -La storia della Arcana Famiglia- Rinato
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a story of destiny and bonds centered around Felicita, the daughter of the boss of Arcana Famiglia, an organization on a small island that possesses mysterious powers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a story of destiny and bonds centered around Felicita, the daughter of the boss of Arcana Famiglia, an organization on a small island that possesses mysterious powers.
